entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
